candle_chart_functions.title: Expand button
candle_chart_functions.text: Expanding sparkline section of candlestick chart to full screen

candle_chart_functions.title: Filter by sesasons
candle_chart_functions.text: Сandlestick chart opens for the last 3 seasons by default. With this function you can sort chart by 3, 5 or 11 seasons

candle_chart_functions.title: Filter by games
candle_chart_functions.text: Сandlestick chart opens for the last all games by default. With this function you can sort chart by home, away or all games

candle_chart_functions.title: Filter by times
candle_chart_functions.text: Сandlestick chart opens by full time game by default. With this function you can sort sticks by full time, first time + second time, first time or second time

candle_chart_functions.title: Filter by goals
candle_chart_functions.text: Сandlestick chart opens with all goals by default. With this function you can sort sticks by games where was scored 3 goals and more or 2 goals and less

candle_chart_functions.title: Filter by cups
candle_chart_functions.text: Сandlestick chart opens with home championship line La liga, Epl, Bundesliga. With this function you can sort sticks with home cups

candle_chart_functions.title: Diagonal levels
candle_chart_functions.text: With this function you can activate the drawing of a “Trend Line” on the candlestick chart of the selected team

about_team_section.title: News
about_team_section.text: Here you can see news about championship or news about selected team. Also u can filter them by tags

about_team_section.title: About team
about_team_section.text: Here you can see information about selected team like station, club name. Also this tab includes most common information about Achievements in selected championship, Kits, Club and Players Records, Facts, Sponsors

about_team_section.title: Performance
about_team_section.text: This tab shows the team's results by year in national cups and European tournaments

about_team_section.title: Team stats
about_team_section.text: In this tab, you can compare the parameters of the selected team with the entire championship or the second selected team, and then filter the indicators by time

about_team_section.title: Football field
about_team_section.text: In this tab, you can compare the parameters of the selected team with the entire championship or the second selected team sorted by different parts of football field, and then filter the indicators by time

about_team_section.title: Calendar
about_team_section.text: n this tab you can find a calendar of the team’s last matches and several future ones, compare the team strength index for future games, and also see “plan-to-fact” statistics.
